dialogue.introduction: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes. Leave the transport missions to me... desu.
dialogue.library_intro: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame. Delicious, wait! a different kind of Harusame! With Murasame and big sis Yuudachi we toured the sea as Destroyer Division 2! Transportation and guarding, I'm a bit good at! Yes!
dialogue.secretary1: Did you have business... with me?
dialogue.secretary2: Hyah! ...C-Commander!? Um... The supplies are fine, they're fine so...
dialogue.secretary3: Commander, um... I have another transport mission, so... Excuse me.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander? ...Um, commander? ...I wonder if he's busy? ...Yeah, I have to do my best too!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Um, I can't really say it well, but... I'm always grateful. Truly.
dialogue.wedding: Commander... U-um, what is it? Is it a new transport mission? Eh, it's not? Then night battle duty? That's not it either? Eh... for me... Fufu, I'll treasure it.
dialogue.show_players_score: A business message is... um... Please look.
dialogue.equipment1: With this... transport missions will progress.
dialogue.equipment2: With this, I'll be able to guard well too...
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yes, I think I'll take a bath.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I've gotten a bit tired... yes.
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairs, seems like it has to be done, okay.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has, yes, been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Mission complete. Fleet returning to base, yes.
dialogue.night_battle: Allow me to start the night battle.
dialogue.mvp: I was the best... really? Really? ...Yes, I'm a little bit happy.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: T-they got me... I can still continue my guard duties.
dialogue.sunk: I guess... that's... it... Murasame-neesan... This time, I'll go on ahead...
dialogue.fall_2015: I want to always do my best together with the admiral in the second destroyer division. Yes!

hourly.0000: It's 0000. Uhm, it's a new day.
hourly.0200: 0200. It's the dead of the night. I'm a little... No! I'm not scared at all.
hourly.0300: 0300. Wah...! Uuu, I'm sorry. I'll be careful from now on.
hourly.0400: 0400. Hey, I'm feeling kind of... I-It's alright! I'm not sleepy, yes!
hourly.0500: 0500. Commander, it's the start of the day. Good morning.
hourly.0600: 0600. Is it alright if Harusame makes breakfast? Right! Let's do it.
hourly.0700: 0700. And for breakfast it's Mapo Haru... I'm kidding. I made a Japanese set meal. Please help yourself to it.
hourly.0800: 0800. Let's work hard for today's transport mission. Transporting and escorting are important.
hourly.0900: 0900. I wonder if Murasame-nee-san is doing well... Hmm...
hourly.1000: 1000. For lunch... Ah, it's still to early for lunch right now. I apologise.
hourly.1100: 1100. Commander, what are you having for lunch? It's not so bad to eat out once in awhile. Uh... Uhm...
hourly.1200: 1200. Eh, it's alright for me to accompany the Commander out for lunch? I'm so happy.
hourly.1300: 1300. It was fun at the western restaurant. I'm glad to have gone, yes.
hourly.1400: 1400. Huh? What's Yuudachi-nee-san doing at such a place? Isn't it dangerous?
hourly.1500: 1500. Commander, uh, uhm... Should I bring along some snacks?
hourly.1600: 1600. The skies are getting darker. It's almost evening, yes.
hourly.1700: 1700. Commander, the sunset is beautiful, isn't it? I feel like I could stare at it forever.
hourly.1800: 1800. I'll prepare dinner. Commander, what do you feel like having?
hourly.1900: 1900. I've gone and done it. Harusame's special Mapo Harusame. T-Try it!
hourly.2000: 2000. How was dinner? The secret ingredients were sesame oil and five-spice powder.
hourly.2100: 2100. Commander, I'll be washing all this dishes up first. Excuse me.
hourly.2200: 2200. Commander, it's about time we made plans for tomorrow's transport mission. Uhm...
hourly.2300: 2300. Oh, uhm, Commander, thanks for the hard work today.
